label: 十陵
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In 858 these were the imperial mausolea (misasagi) of Tenchi-Tennō, Kōnin-Tennō's father, Kōnin-Tennō, Kammu-Tennō's mother, Kammu-Tennō, Heijō-Tennō's mother, Sudō-Tennō, Heijō-Tennō, Nimmyō-Tennō, and Montoku-Tennō. In 872 Montoku-Tennō's mother's mausoleum replaced that of Kammu-Tennō's mother. In 884 the mausoleum of Kōkō-Tennō's mother replaced that of Kōnin-Tennō's father. In 930 the mausolea of Kōkō-Tennō and Daigo-Tennō's mother replaced those of Heijō-Tennō and Montoku-Tennō.
